CubeWidgetGL Class Reference

This class renders a 3D Model of the Qube5 in OpenGL and acts as an Editor for a single Figure. More...

#include <cubewidgetgl.h>

Detailed Description

This class renders a 3D Model of the Qube5 in OpenGL and acts as an Editor for a single Figure.
